abstract: Supreme Court agrees to hear a pair of cases on whether corporations and political groups may be sued in American courts for complicity in human rights abuses abroad; one case involves Nigerians suing Royal Dutch Shell.
snippet: The court is being asked whether corporations and political groups can be sued in the United States on accusations of human rights abuses abroad.

keywords.name: subject
keywords.value: Human Rights and Human Rights Violations

lead_paragraph: The court is being asked whether corporations and political groups can be sued in the United States on accusations of human rights abuses abroad.

headline.main: Supreme Court to Hear 2 Human Rights Cases
headline.print_headline: Two Human Rights Cases On Supreme Court Docket
headline.seo: Supreme Court to Hear Two Human Rights Cases
